Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Influential \In`flu*en"tial\ ([i^]n`fl[-u]*[e^]n"shal), a. [See {Influence}.] Exerting or possessing influence or power; potent; efficacious; effective; strong; having authority or ascendency; as, an influential man, station, argument, etc. [1913 Webster]
A very influential Gascon prefix. --Earle. [1913 Webster]
influential adj : having or exercising influence or power; "an influential newspaper"; "influential leadership for peace" [ant: {uninfluential}]
